overview: Sweetheart is pushing the boundaries of lesbian love-making again with Strap-On Specialists. Dani and Dana are lovers who need something extra to help keep their love life spontaneous. Kara and Hayden finally take a much needed break from studying to learn something new about themselves. Kami and Sinn are two friends away at college who get a special care package from their girlfriends back home. Aiden wants to teach her daughter’s friend, Leilani, something about experimentation. With real sex and real orgasms, this is one lesbian adventure you’re sure to enjoy. Directed by James Avalon.
title: Lesbian Adventures: Strap-On Specialists 4
